Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, ViewObserver
public class ClientController extends Object implements ViewObserver, Observer
This client-side class allows the client (by using a CLI or a GUI) to communicate with the server via the network. It wraps messages from the client and sends them to the server via the network, and unwraps messages from the server (via the network) in order to ask something to the client via CLI/GUI.

  • Method Details

    • onUpdateServerData

      public void onUpdateServerData(String address, int port)
      Establishes a connection with the server via the given address and the given port. Then, asks the client for their nickname.
      Specified by:
      onUpdateServerData in interface ViewObserver
      Parameters:
      address - the given address.
      port - the given port.

    • onUpdateNickname

      public void onUpdateNickname(String nickname)
      Sends to the server a login request with the chosen nickname.
      Specified by:
      onUpdateNickname in interface ViewObserver
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname the client wants to (try to) login with.

    • onUpdateCreateOrJoin

      public void onUpdateCreateOrJoin(String choice)
      Based on the client's choice, asks for the game parameters (if the choice is "CREATE") or asks for an existing game number (if the choice is "JOIN").
      Specified by:
      onUpdateCreateOrJoin in interface ViewObserver
      Parameters:
      choice - the choice made by the client.

    • onUpdateGameInfo

      public void onUpdateGameInfo(int gameNumber, boolean mode, int numOfPlayers)
      Sends to the server the game parameters chosen by the client, so that it can build the desired game.
      Specified by:
      onUpdateGameInfo in interface ViewObserver
      Parameters:
      gameNumber - the ID of the game the client wishes to create.
      mode - the game mode of the game the client wishes to create (false -> NORMAL, true -> EXPERT).
      numOfPlayers - the maximum number of players of the game the client wishes to create.

      public void onUpdateCharacterCard(int characterCardID)

    • onUpdateCharacterCardInt

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      characterCardID - the ID of the Character Card the client wishes to play.
      par - the required int parameter (its meaning changes from card to card).

    • update

      public void update(Message message)
      When receiving a message from the client, the server may: - ask for more info (case ASK_TYPE). - answer with the desired info (other cases). Note that the default branch should never be reached.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      message - the message received from the server.

    • isValidAddress

      public static boolean isValidAddress(String address)
      Checks if the given string is a valid IPv4 address by using a regex.
      Parameters:
      address - the String given by the client.

    • isValidPort

      public static boolean isValidPort(String portStr)
      Checks if the given String is in the range of allowed ports when parsed to int.
      Parameters:
      portStr - the String given by the client.

    • isReachable

      public void isReachable()
      Checks if the server is reachable. If it isn't, displays a message and closes the app.
